title: Wireless Charger 4 in 1 for Apple Charging Station for iPhone 16 Pro Max/15/14 Series, AirPods Pro 2, iPad Stand, Watch Charger for iWatch Series 10/9/8, Wireless Charging Station for Multiple Devices
description: 【Use Included Power Adapter and Cable】- ⚡To get the best charging results from our 4 in 1 apple charger station, please use the adapter and cable provided or one with an output power greater than 12V 3.7A. Using a low voltage adapter may cause slow or no charging. The iPad charging port supports 18W max fast charging, but it might charge a bit slower than the original charger.

top_reviews.title: Fabulous
top_reviews.body: Such a great idea, it works with my iPhone 11 plus, plus I was a little concerned when the charging light did not come on for the ear pod case but it charged anyway. Read more
